div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1156 Asia Minor, western?, c. 1949 Burial: c. 600-575 B.C. (M) Contents: 56+ EL, 4+ AR Lydia: 56 EL: 1 third; 1 sixth; 28 twelfths (lion hd.); 24 twenty-fourths; 2 forty- eighths (lion paw) Unc. mint: 4 AR: 3 hemiob.; 1 tetart. (as SNGBerry 1040 ff.) Disposition: New York 6 (Lydia) Photos in ANS
